item.title: How to Prep for a Hackathon as a Designer
item.description: Team Culture Make sure your team values design. And I mean values design. It is very easy to say that design is valuable, so understanding what they really mean gives more clarity. Because, when someone is not truly listening to or respecting your design decisions, all hell can break loose. And I’m not just talking about hell for you, my friend. It can be hell for everyone on the team: developers, engineers, leaders.
